frontmatter.title: B.E. in Electronics and Communication
frontmatter.company: Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology

node.html:
• Digitalized the entire evaluation process of the Capstone Project for the faculty of the Computer Science and Engineering Department of TIET.
  • Developed a production-ready web-based application using back-end as Flask and MySQL database.
  • Major functionalities include team creation, mentor assignment for a team, marks assignment and update, panel creation, and mentor and panel evaluation.
